√sap 'serve'

present: [1.] sápati  sápate etc.  

perfect: sepus  

aorist: [3.] sīṣapanta  

[future: sapiṣyati  sapitā  ]

secondary: causative: sāpáyant?  

derivatives: -sāp  sápa B.S.  -sapin RV.  sapar- V.+  sápti V.+  

The relations of part of these forms are very doubtful.
